Datatable.LocalizationPair: A valiant, hardworking, and honorable race of mechanical beings from the planet Cybertron.

Home Planet Type: Barren Diplomatic Alignment: Good Gameplay: Peaceful and Isolationist Main Victory Type: Economic/Diplomatic
Descended from a labor class of autonomous cybernetic organisms, the Autobots retain a sense of honor, a strong work ethic, and a dedication to order and justice. They have battled for millennia with the Decepticons and have become hardened warriors through the process, yet still with a sense of optimism and hope.
The Autobots, led by the heroic Optimus Prime, have found themselves stranded on a new, mysterious planet, while attempting to stop an experiment being conducted by the calculating and power-hungry Decepticon Shockwave. They are unsure how they arrived, but they will seek out how they might return to their home planet and resume their struggle.
Provides a basic set of faction traits similar to the Autobots
Ruthless, warlike mechanical beings from the planet Cybertron, bent on universal conquest.

Home Planet Type: Lava Diplomatic Alignment: Evil Gameplay: Conquest, Glory Main Victory Type: Military/Population
The Decepticons are led by the ruthless and charismatic Megatron, a former miner turned gladiator turned rebel turned conqueror. While the Decepticon movement originally spawned from a repressed class of autonomous, cybernetic beings in order to seek justice and equality, their cause eventually turned to the destruction of their enemies and the spread of their form of life, and rule, across the universe.
Shockwave, a calculating and dangerous Decepticon, was running an experiment in quantum reality manipulation when a host of Autobots, sworn enemies of the Decepticons, invaded in an attempt to stop the experiment. Damage to the quantum manipulation equipment appears to have transported the Decepticons to a new and unforgiving planet. After gathering themselves together, they have quickly resolved to explore their new environment, exploit it, and resume their dominating ways.
Provides a basic set of faction traits similar to the Decepticons

A high-ranking and friendly Autobot officer, Jazz is a rabid consumer of culture as well as a deft warrior and spy. He volunteered to explore the galaxy to make contact with other cultures and gather intelligence for the Autobots, and decided he should make himself useful at the same time.

Swindle joined up with the Decepticon cause not so much for the conquest and principles, but for the rich variety of financial opportunities, above board and otherwise, that membership opened up for him. After millions of years of experience, he has become an expert at business dealings, and running a colony is just another path to riches for him.
Gives a Food bonus on planets with low Food production
